snippet: On the eve of a primary, Senator Richard G. Lugar’s campaign was by no means in retreat despite poll numbers that showed the support of only 38 percent of likely voters.
abstract: Sen Richard G Lugar, Republican of Indiana, is fighting for re-election to his seventh term in office on the eve of the Republican primary after poll numbers show that he has the support of only 38 percent of likely voters; his opponent is Richard E Mourdock, who is receiving support from national conservative groups.
lead_paragraph: On the eve of a primary, Senator Richard G. Lugar’s campaign was by no means in retreat despite poll numbers that showed the support of only 38 percent of likely voters.

headline.seo: Richard Lugar Battles on Eve of Primary Vote in Indiana
headline.main: On the Eve of Voting, a Senator Fights On
headline.print_headline: On the Eve Of Voting, A Senator Fights On
